import React, { useState } from "react"; import { makeStyles, Drawer, Button, ClickAwayListener, Accordion, AccordionSummary, AccordionDetails, MenuList, MenuItem, ButtonGroup } from "@material-ui/core"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Menu } from "@material-ui/icons" import image from "../../assets/logo.5a82c15d88ad2d074447.png" const drawerWidth = "128px"; //put all the front stuff under on accordion or like it currently is? const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ closed:{ transition: "margin-left 450ms cubic-bezier(0.23, 1, 0.32, 1)", background: `url(${image}) right center/contain no-repeat #3f51b5`, }, button:{ position:"relative", overflow:"hidden", display:"flex", flexDirection:"column", justifyContent:"left", color:"white", borderRadius:"5px", textDecoration:"none", textTransform:"uppercase", background:"transparent", border:"currentColor", fontSize:"15px", padding:"10px", '&:hover':{ backgroundColor:"#2a3576", opacity:"0.5", transition:"background-color 250ms \ cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms,box-shadow \ 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms,border \ 250ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) 0ms", } }, accord:{ background:"transparent", color:"white" } })); function SideBar() { const classes = useStyles(); const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); return(
setOpen(false)}>
About Us Information Resources
); }; export default SideBar;
